job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout the RolestrongppEvry Health is hiring a fullstack Software Engineer to help us automate healthcare delivery care coordination wellness and risk managementnbspThis is an innovative role for somebody to participate in building Evry Healths technology infrastructureppbrppYoull write some code from scratch and also be part of integrating applications and automating testingnbspYoull be part of the software team working alongside both application and frontend software developersppbrppThe engineering efforts will include developing new portals for members and healthcare providers new mobile tools a service fabric and communications layer a machine learning layer and integrating large vendor systemsppbrppstrongTechnologies We UsestrongpulliLanguages C Javascript HTML SQLliliPlatforms NET Core React Core Azure Azure DevOpsliliProtocolsnbspEverything pun intended from EDI to message queues to APIsliliTools Github XUnit Swaggerio RabbitMQ Microsoft TeamsliulpbrppstrongAbout Evry HealthstrongppOur mission is to fix US healthcare Evry Health is a startup technology company and health insurer backed by Y Combinator and several Silicon Valley venture capital funds We build better health insurance for midsize businesses and their employees that costs up to 20 less The company headquarters are in Dallas TX USAppbrppstrongKey ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliWrite and test fullstack web applications as part of an agile teamliliResponsible for the development support and maintenance for internally developed web applications web services integration services backend services and database systemsliliBuild systems for reliability and longterm efficiencyautomationliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliWe require a Bachelors Degree and 2 years of experience is preferredliliSolid objectoriented design programming and debugging skillsliliC experienceliliStrong generalist software engineering skills ideally with experience building fullstack web applicationsliliDeep intellectual curiosityliliExcellent written and spoken communication skillsliliLoves working crossfunctionally and owning projects from start to finish  including the testing and QAliliBonus Any experience with data science machinelearning statistics or mobile application developmentliulpbrppstrongLocation and BenefitsstrongpulliWe have offices in Dallas TX but are presently working 100 remote until we return to the officesliliFull benefits package including health insurance 401k matching and vacationliulpbrppstrongWhy You Should Join Evry HealthstrongppEvry Health has a small team that makes the software that runs Evry HealthnbspWe believe our software is a key competitive advantage and we are investing aggressively in new software productsppbrppEvry Health has ambitious plans to improve the quality and accessibility of healthcare while reversing the national price inflation and the only way to reach that level of impact is to scale through software What weve built so far is probably only 10 of what we will eventually needppbrppAs a member of the software team youll learn many of the ins and outs of the US healthcare systemnbspNot only will you be growing your engineering skills but youll absorb a great deal about public health policynbspYour work will impact lives families and communitiesnbspYoull also be exposed to the startup world and see how the best ideas can be nurtured and testednbspAnd of course if you ever want to start your own company youll learn a lot about that from working at Evry Healthppbrppnbspp
